General.Name: Turker Proje Gayrimenkul Ve Yatirim Gelistirme AS
General.Description: Türker Proje Gayrimenkul ve Yatirim Gelistirme A.S. develops real estate properties in Turkey. The company was formerly known as Mutlu Yatirim Proje ve Gayrimenkul Gelistirme A.S. and changed its name to Türker Proje Gayrimenkul ve Yatirim Gelistirme A.S. in May 2015. The company was incorporated in 2013 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey. Türker Proje Gayrimenkul ve Yatirim Gelistirme A.S. is a subsidiary of Türker Yatirim Holding A.S.
General.Address: Acibadem Mah. Çeçen Sok., Istanbul, Turkey, 34660
